Synopsis: Creates a new carousel slide with specified content, background color, and height.
Description: This function creates a new carousel slide with the provided content, background color, and height. The slide content is specified using a script block, the background color is a string representing a color, and the height is a numerical value.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
New-CarouselSlide -SlideContent { "This is the content of the slide" } -BackgroundColor 'blue' -Height 200
Creates a new carousel slide with the specified content, background color 'blue', and height of 200 pixels.
